斻斻斻
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 𣃚, 航
Связанный символ (и): 𣃚, 航

斻字的基本解释

斻
háng
相并的两船。
古同“航”：“造舟于渭，北斻泾流。”

斻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［háng］
［《集韻》寒剛切，平唐，匣。］
(1)方舟。两船相并。
(2)浮桥。
(3)航。以舟度水。

斻字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　斻； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页481第09
【唐韻】胡郞切【集韻】【韻會】寒剛切【正韻】胡剛切，?音杭。【說文】方舟也。禮，天子造舟，諸侯維舟，大夫方舟，士特舟。【註】徐鉉曰：今俗別作航，非是。【後漢·杜篤傳】造舟於渭，北斻涇流。【註】斻，自度也。《方言》自關而東或謂舟爲航。○按《說文》斻字在方部。今流俗不解，遂與杭字相亂者，誤也。

斻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
斻字的起名意思

相并的两船，古同“航”，有航行之义。

Pour
Basic explanation of words
Pour
háng
Two ships merged.
Gu Tong "navigation": "Building a boat in Wei, Beimao Jingliu."
Pour
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［háng］
["Ji Yun" Han Gang cut, Ping Tang, box. ]
(1) The Ark. The two ships merged.
(2) Floating bridge.
(3) Navigation. Take the boat to save the water.
Pour
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　斻; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 481 09
[Tang Yun] Hu Yin cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Han Gang cut [Zheng Yun] Hu Gang cut,? Yinhang. [Said the text] Ark too. Ceremony, the emperor builds the boat, the princes Weizhou, the doctor's ark, the Shitezhou. [Note] Xu Xuan said: Don’t sail today, no. [Post-Han·Du Du Biography] Boats were built in Wei, Beipujingliu. [Note] Zhuo, self-restraint. "Dialect" is from the Guan to the east, or the boat is sailing. ○According to "Shuowen", the word is in the square part. People who are confused with Hangzi are mistaken.

Name meaning
The two ships that were merged were the same "navigation" in ancient times, meaning navigation.
